entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:14 AM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 except minus 22 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 18 except minus 22 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023
